children.name: movement.speed
children.title: Speed
children.tooltip:
Horizontal speed multiplier of the NPC.
0.0 uses config value "movement.speed".

children.text: The NPC will pick a random interval, in ticks, during which to idle.
Start of the idling interval will be randomly picked from the range [Range Lower Bound, Range Lower Bound + Range Length].

children.name: movement.idle.start.start
children.title: Range Lower Bound
children.tooltip: -1 uses config value "movement.idle.start.start".

children.name: movement.idle.start.length
children.title: Range Length
children.tooltip: -1 uses config value "movement.idle.start.length"

children.text: Length of the idling interval will be randomly picked from the range [Range Lower Bound, Range Lower Bound + Range Length].

children.name: movement.idle.length.start
children.title: Range Lower Bound
children.tooltip: -1 uses config value "movement.idle.length.start"

children.name: movement.idle.length.length
children.title: Range Length
children.tooltip: -1 uses config value "movement.idle.length.length"

children.text: Cooldown between jumps will be randomly picked from the range [Range Lower Bound, Range Lower Bound + Range Length].

children.name: movement.jump.time.start
children.title: Range Lower Bound
children.tooltip: -1 uses config value "movement.jump.time.start"

children.name: movement.jump.time.length
children.title: Range Length
children.tooltip: -1 uses config value "movement.jump.time.length".

children.text: Strength of a jump will be randomly picked from the range [Range Lower Bound, Range Lower Bound + Range Length].

children.name: movement.jump.strength.start
children.title: Range Lower Bound
children.tooltip: 0.0 uses config value "movement.jump.strength.start".

children.name: movement.jump.strength.length
children.title: Range Length
children.tooltip: 0.0 uses config value "movement.jump.strength.length".

children.text: Time between successive attacks will be randomly picked from the range [Range Lower Bound, Range Lower Bound + Range Length].

children.name: attack.timing.cooldown.start
children.title: Range Lower Bound
children.tooltip: -1 uses config value "attack.timing.cooldown.start".

children.name: attack.timing.cooldown.length
children.title: Range Length
children.tooltip: -1 uses config value "attack.timing.cooldown.length"

children.name: attack.standard.weight
children.title: Weight
children.tooltip:
Attack weight.
Higher weight gives this attack a higher chance to be picked, 0 disables it.
-1 uses config value "attack.standard.weight".

children.text:
What NPC to use as breath.
If "Use Config" is enabled, or no NPC is selected, uses config value "attack.standard.breath.id".

children.name: attack.standard.breath.speed
children.title: Speed
children.tooltip:
Movement speed of breath.
0.0 uses config value "attack.standard.breath.speed".

children.text:
If enabled, breath NPC will move towards the nearest player's y position at the time of breath.
May be incompatible with another NPC than the default breath NPC.
"Default" uses config value "attack.standard.breath.chase.enabled".

Deviation from the target will be randomly picked from the range [Range Lower Bound, Range Lower Bound + Range Length].
If "Use Config" is enabled, uses config values "attack.standard.breath.chase.range.start" and "attack.standard.breath.chase.range.length".

Audio file played on breath.
If "ID" is set to 0, uses the file. Otherwise, uses internal sound effect with the id "ID".

children.name: attack.standard.breath.audio.volume
children.title: Volume
children.tooltip: 0.0 uses config value "attack.standard.breath.audio.volume".

children.name: attack.standard.breath.audio.config
children.title: Use Config
children.tooltip: If checked, uses config value "attack.standard.breath.audio.id", or "attack.standard.breath.audio.file" if the former is 0.

children.name: attack.standard.timing.pre
children.title: Prefire Time
children.tooltip:
Time it takes to prepare the breath, before shooting it out.
-1 uses config value "attack.standard.timing.pre".

children.name: attack.standard.timing.post
children.title: Postfire Time
children.tooltip:
Time it takes to return to normal state, after shooting the breath.
-1 uses config value "attack.standard.timing.post".

children.name: attack.standard.spawn.center
children.title: Center
children.tooltip:
If enabled, breath NPC will be centered upon spawn.
"Default" uses config value "attack.standard.spawn.center".

children.text:
Pixel offset from the NPC's spawn pivot point at which to spawn the breath NPC.
If disabled, uses config values "attack.standard.spawn.offset.x" and "attack.standard.spawn.offset.y".

children.name: attack.multi.weight
children.title: Weight
children.tooltip:
Attack weight.
Higher weight gives this attack a higher chance to be picked, 0 disables it.
-1 uses config value "attack.multi.weight".

children.text:
What NPC to use as breath.
If "Use Config" is enabled, or no NPC is selected, uses config value "attack.multi.breath.id".

children.name: attack.multi.breath.speed
children.title: Speed
children.tooltip:
Movement speed of breath.
0.0 uses config value "attack.multi.breath.speed".

children.text:
If enabled, breath NPC will move towards the nearest player's y position at the time of breath.
May be incompatible with another NPC than the default breath NPC.
"Default" uses config value "attack.multi.breath.chase.enabled".

Deviation from the target will be randomly picked from the range [Range Lower Bound, Range Lower Bound + Range Length].
If "Use Config" is enabled, uses config values "attack.multi.breath.chase.range.start" and "attack.multi.breath.chase.range.length".
Count of breathed fires will be randomly picked from the range [Range Lower Bound, Range Lower Bound + Range Length].

children.name: attack.multi.breath.count.start
children.title: Range Lower Bound
children.tooltip: -1 uses config value "attack.multi.breath.count.start".

children.name: attack.multi.breath.count.length
children.title: Range Length
children.tooltip: -1 uses config value "attack.multi.breath.count.length".

children.text:
Audio file played on breath.
If "ID" is set to 0, uses the file. Otherwise, uses internal sound effect with the id "ID".

children.name: attack.multi.breath.audio.volume
children.title: Volume
children.tooltip: 0.0 uses config value "attack.multi.breath.audio.volume".

children.name: attack.multi.breath.audio.config
children.title: Use Config
children.tooltip: If checked, uses config value "attack.multi.breath.audio.id", or "attack.multi.breath.audio.file" if the former is 0.

children.name: attack.multi.timing.pre
children.title: Prefire Time
children.tooltip:
Time it takes to prepare the breath, before shooting it out.
-1 uses config value "attack.multi.timing.pre".

children.name: attack.multi.timing.post
children.title: Postfire Time
children.tooltip:
Time it takes to return to normal state, after shooting the breath.
-1 uses config value "attack.multi.timing.post".

children.name: attack.multi.spawn.center
children.title: Center
children.tooltip:
If enabled, breath NPC will be centered upon spawn.
"Default" uses config value "attack.multi.spawn.center".

children.text:
Pixel offset from the NPC's spawn pivot point at which to spawn the breath NPC.
If disabled, uses config values "attack.multi.spawn.offset.x" and "attack.multi.spawn.offset.y".

children.name: attack.flamethrower.weight
children.title: Weight
children.tooltip:
Attack weight.
Higher weight gives this attack a higher chance to be picked, 0 disables it.
-1 uses config value "attack.flamethrower.weight".

children.text:
What NPC to use as breath.
If "Use Config" is enabled, or no NPC is selected, uses config value "attack.flamethrower.breath.id".
Horizontal speed will be randomly picked from the range [Range Lower Bound, Range Lower Bound + Range Length].

children.name: attack.flamethrower.breath.speed.x.start
children.title: Range Lower Bound
children.tooltip: 0.0 uses config value "attack.flamethrower.speed.x.start".

children.name: attack.flamethrower.breath.speed.x.length
children.title: Range Length
children.tooltip: 0.0 uses config value "attack.flamethrower.speed.x.length".

children.text: Vertical speed will be randomly picked from the range [Range Lower Bound, Range Lower Bound + Range Length].

children.name: attack.flamethrower.breath.speed.y.start
children.title: Range Lower Bound
children.tooltip: 0.0 uses config value "attack.flamethrower.speed.y.start".

children.name: attack.flamethrower.breath.speed.y.length
children.title: Range Length
children.tooltip: 0.0 uses config value "attack.flamethrower.speed.y.length".

children.text: Count of breathed flames will be randomly picked from the range [Range Lower Bound, Range Lower Bound + Range Length].

children.name: attack.flamethrower.breath.count.start
children.title: Range Lower Bound
children.tooltip: -1 uses config value "attack.flamethrower.breath.count.start".

children.name: attack.flamethrower.breath.count.length
children.title: Range Length
children.tooltip: -1 uses config value "attack.flamethrower.breath.count.length".

children.text:
Audio file played during breath.
This will be looped for the entire duration.
If "ID" is set to 0, uses the file. Otherwise, uses internal sound effect with the id "ID".

children.name: attack.flamethrower.breath.audio.volume
children.title: Volume
children.tooltip: 0.0 uses config value "attack.flamethrower.breath.audio.volume".

children.name: attack.flamethrower.breath.audio.config
children.title: Use Config
children.tooltip: If checked, uses config value "attack.flamethrower.breath.audio.id", or "attack.flamethrower.breath.audio.file" if the former is 0.

children.name: attack.flamethrower.timing.pre
children.title: Prefire Time
children.tooltip:
Time it takes to prepare the breath, before shooting it out.
-1 uses config value "attack.flamethrower.timing.pre".

children.name: attack.flamethrower.timing.cooldown
children.title: Cooldown Time
children.tooltip:
Time it takes between each flame.
-1 uses config value "attack.flamethrower.timing.cooldown".

children.name: attack.flamethrower.timing.fade.in
children.title: In
children.tooltip:
Time it takes to fade the audio in, when starting breathe.
-1 uses config value "attack.flamethrower.timing.fade.in".

children.name: attack.flamethrower.timing.fade.out
children.title: Out
children.tooltip:
Time it takes to fade the audio out, when ending breathe.
-1 uses config value "attack.flamethrower.timing.fade.out".

children.name: attack.flamethrower.spawn.center
children.title: Center
children.tooltip:
If enabled, breath NPC will be centered upon spawn.
"Default" uses config value "attack.flamethrower.spawn.center".

children.text:
Pixel offset from the NPC's spawn pivot point at which to spawn the breath NPC.
If disabled, uses config values "attack.flamethrower.spawn.offset.x" and "attack.flamethrower.spawn.offset.y".

children.name: attack.hammer.weight
children.title: Weight
children.tooltip:
Attack weight.
Higher weight gives this attack a higher chance to be picked, 0 disables it.
-1 uses config value "attack.hammer.weight".

children.text:
What NPC to use as projectile.
If "Use Config" is enabled, or no NPC is selected, uses config value "attack.hammer.breath.id".
Horizontal speed will be randomly picked from the range [Range Lower Bound, Range Lower Bound + Range Length].

children.name: attack.hammer.projectile.speed.x.start
children.title: Range Lower Bound
children.tooltip: 0.0 uses config value "attack.hammer.speed.x.start".

children.name: attack.hammer.projectile.speed.x.length
children.title: Range Length
children.tooltip: 0.0 uses config value "attack.hammer.speed.x.length".

children.text: Vertical speed will be randomly picked from the range [Range Lower Bound, Range Lower Bound + Range Length].

children.name: attack.hammer.projectile.speed.y.start
children.title: Range Lower Bound
children.tooltip: 0.0 uses config value "attack.hammer.speed.y.start".

children.name: attack.hammer.projectile.speed.y.length
children.title: Range Length
children.tooltip: 0.0 uses config value "attack.hammer.speed.y.length".

children.text: Count of thrown projectiles will be randomly picked from the range [Range Lower Bound, Range Lower Bound + Range Length].

children.name: attack.hammer.projectile.count.start
children.title: Range Lower Bound
children.tooltip: -1 uses config value "attack.hammer.projectile.count.start".

children.name: attack.hammer.projectile.count.length
children.title: Range Length
children.tooltip: -1 uses config value "attack.hammer.projectile.count.length".

children.text:
Audio file played on projectile throw.
If "ID" is set to 0, uses the file. Otherwise, uses internal sound effect with the id "ID".

children.name: attack.hammer.projectile.audio.volume
children.title: Volume
children.tooltip: 0.0 uses config value "attack.hammer.projectile.audio.volume".

children.name: attack.hammer.projectile.audio.config
children.title: Use Config
children.tooltip: If checked, uses config value "attack.hammer.projectile.audio.id", or "attack.hammer.projectile.audio.file" if the former is 0.

children.name: attack.hammer.timing.pre
children.title: Prefire Time
children.tooltip:
Time it takes to prepare the projectile, before throwing them.
-1 uses config value "attack.hammer.timing.pre".

children.name: attack.hammer.timing.cooldown
children.title: Cooldown Time
children.tooltip:
Time it takes between each projectile.
-1 uses config value "attack.hammer.timing.cooldown".

children.name: attack.hammer.spawn.center
children.title: Center
children.tooltip:
If enabled, breath NPC will be centered upon spawn.
"Default" uses config value "attack.hammer.spawn.center".

children.text:
Pixel offset from the NPC's spawn pivot point at which to spawn the projectile NPC.
If disabled, uses config values "attack.hammer.spawn.offset.x" and "attack.hammer.spawn.offset.y".

children.name: hit.health.hp
children.title: HP
children.tooltip:
Number of hitpoints the NPC has.
0 uses config value "hit.health.hp".

children.name: hit.health.sub
children.title: Sub HP
children.tooltip:
Number of hits from a player projectile required to knock down one HP.
0 uses config value "hit.health.sub".

children.name: hit.health.invulnerability
children.title: Invulnerability
children.tooltip:
Ticks that the NPC will be invulnerable for after HP decreases.
-1 uses config value "hit.health.invulnerability".

children.text:
Audio file played when the HP decreases.
If "ID" is set to 0, uses the file. Otherwise, uses internal sound effect with the id "ID".

children.name: hit.health.audio.hurt.volume
children.title: Volume
children.tooltip: 0.0 uses config value "hit.health.audio.hurt.volume".

children.name: hit.health.audio.hurt.config
children.title: Use Config
children.tooltip: If checked, uses config value "hit.health.audio.hurt.id", or "hit.health.audio.hurt.file" if the former is 0.

children.name: hit.health.graphics.transition.time
children.title: Time
children.tooltip:
How long the transition into the screen should take.
-1 uses config value "hit.health.graphics.transition.time".

children.text:
How far from its usual position will the GUI be positioned at the beginning of the transition.
Moves to (0, 0) over time.
-1 uses config values "hit.health.graphics.transition.position.x" and "hit.health.graphics.transition.position.y".

children.name: hit.health.graphics.transition.position.x
children.title: X
children.tooltip: 0 uses config value "hit.health.graphics.transition.position.x".

children.name: hit.health.graphics.transition.position.y
children.title: Y
children.tooltip: 0 uses config value "hit.health.graphics.transition.position.y".

children.text:
Icon displayed next to the health bar.
Health is positioned relative to this.

children.name: hit.health.graphics.icon.config
children.title: Use Config
children.tooltip: Uses config value "hit.health.graphics.icon.file" if enabled.

children.name: hit.health.graphics.icon.position.x
children.title: X
children.tooltip: -1 uses config value "hit.health.graphics.icon.position.x".

children.name: hit.health.graphics.icon.position.y
children.title: Y
children.tooltip: -1 uses config value "hit.health.graphics.icon.position.y".

children.text:
One sliver of health.
Positioned relative to the icon.

children.name: hit.health.graphics.health.config
children.title: Use Config
children.tooltip: Uses config value "hit.health.graphics.health.file" if enabled.

children.name: hit.health.graphics.health.position.x
children.title: X
children.tooltip:
Multiplied by a factor for every health sliver.
0 uses config value "hit.health.graphics.health.position.x".

children.name: hit.health.graphics.health.position.offsetx
children.title: X Offset
children.tooltip:
Static value for every health sliver.
0 uses config value "hit.health.graphics.health.position.offsetx".

children.name: hit.health.graphics.health.position.y
children.title: Y
children.tooltip:
Multiplied by a factor for every health sliver.
0 uses config value "hit.health.graphics.health.position.y".

children.name: hit.health.graphics.health.position.offsety
children.title: Y Offset
children.tooltip:
Static value for every health sliver.
0 uses config value "hit.health.graphics.health.position.offsety".

children.text:
One sliver of armor.
Only appears above 50 HP.
Positioned relative to the icon.

children.name: hit.health.graphics.armor.config
children.title: Use Config
children.tooltip: Uses config value "hit.health.graphics.armor.file" if enabled.

children.name: hit.health.graphics.armor.position.x
children.title: X
children.tooltip:
Multiplied by a factor for every health sliver.
0 uses config value "hit.health.graphics.armor.position.x".

children.name: hit.health.graphics.armor.position.offsetx
children.title: X Offset
children.tooltip:
Static value for every armor sliver.
0 uses config value "hit.health.graphics.armor.position.offsetx".

children.name: hit.health.graphics.armor.position.y
children.title: Y
children.tooltip:
Multiplied by a factor for every armor sliver.
0 uses config value "hit.health.graphics.armor.position.y".

children.name: hit.health.graphics.health.position.offsety
children.title: Y Offset
children.tooltip:
Static value for every armor sliver.
0 uses config value "hit.health.graphics.armor.position.offsety".

children.text:
Settings relating to when the NPC is hit by the player, one of their projectiles or another, unrelated cause.
Setting 0 damage of both types for some cases, such as a jump, will result in the player taking damage instead.
Triggers when the player performs a regular jump on the NPC.

children.name: hit.definition.jump.damage
children.title: Damage
children.tooltip:
HP deducted from the NPC by this harm type.
-1 uses config value "hit.definition.jump.damage".

children.name: hit.definition.jump.sub
children.title: Sub Damage
children.tooltip:
Sub HP deducted from the NPC by this harm type.
-1 uses config value "hit.definition.jump.sub".

children.text: Triggers when the player hits a bumpable block below the NPC.

children.name: hit.definition.below.damage
children.title: Damage
children.tooltip:
HP deducted from the NPC by this harm type.
-1 uses config value "hit.definition.below.damage".

children.name: hit.definition.below.sub
children.title: Sub Damage
children.tooltip:
Sub HP deducted from the NPC by this harm type.
-1 uses config value "hit.definition.below.sub".

children.text: Triggers from a variety of cases not handled by other harm types, such as player fireballs or hammers. See documentation for more information.

children.name: hit.definition.npc.damage
children.title: Damage
children.tooltip:
HP deducted from the NPC by this harm type.
-1 uses config value "hit.definition.npc.damage".

children.name: hit.definition.npc.sub
children.title: Sub Damage
children.tooltip:
Sub HP deducted from the NPC by this harm type.
-1 uses config value "hit.definition.npc.sub".

children.text: Triggers when hit by a projectile NPC, most commonly thrown by players.

children.name: hit.definition.projectile.damage
children.title: Damage
children.tooltip:
HP deducted from the NPC by this harm type.
-1 uses config value "hit.definition.projectile.damage".

children.name: hit.definition.projectile.sub
children.title: Sub Damage
children.tooltip:
Sub HP deducted from the NPC by this harm type.
-1 uses config value "hit.definition.projectile.sub".

children.text: Triggers when hit by an NPC held by a player.

children.name: hit.definition.held.damage
children.title: Damage
children.tooltip:
HP deducted from the NPC by this harm type.
-1 uses config value "hit.definition.held.damage".

children.name: hit.definition.held.sub
children.title: Sub Damage
children.tooltip:
Sub HP deducted from the NPC by this harm type.
-1 uses config value "hit.definition.held.sub".

children.text: Triggers when touching lava.

children.name: hit.definition.lava.damage
children.title: Damage
children.tooltip:
HP deducted from the NPC by this harm type.
-1 uses config value "hit.definition.lava.damage".

children.name: hit.definition.lava.sub
children.title: Sub Damage
children.tooltip:
Sub HP deducted from the NPC by this harm type.
-1 uses config value "hit.definition.lava.sub".

children.text: Triggers when hit by the player's tail.

children.name: hit.definition.tail.damage
children.title: Damage
children.tooltip:
HP deducted from the NPC by this harm type.
-1 uses config value "hit.definition.tail.damage".

children.name: hit.definition.tail.sub
children.title: Sub Damage
children.tooltip:
Sub HP deducted from the NPC by this harm type.
-1 uses config value "hit.definition.tail.sub".

children.text: Triggers when the player performs a spin jump on the NPC.

children.name: hit.definition.spinjump.damage
children.title: Damage
children.tooltip:
HP deducted from the NPC by this harm type.
-1 uses config value "hit.definition.spinjump.damage".

children.name: hit.definition.spinjump.sub
children.title: Sub Damage
children.tooltip:
Sub HP deducted from the NPC by this harm type.
-1 uses config value "hit.definition.spinjump.sub".

children.text: Triggers when the player attacks as Link.

children.name: hit.definition.sword.damage
children.title: Damage
children.tooltip:
HP deducted from the NPC by this harm type.
-1 uses config value "hit.definition.sword.damage".

children.name: hit.definition.sword.sub
children.title: Sub Damage
children.tooltip:
Sub HP deducted from the NPC by this harm type.
-1 uses config value "hit.definition.sword.sub".

children.text: Audio file played during the fight.

children.name: battle.music.config
children.title: Use Config
children.tooltip: If enabled, uses config value "battle.music.id", or "battle.music.file" if the former is -1.

children.text: If "ID" is set to -1, uses the file. Otherwise, uses internal music with the 0-indexed id "ID".

children.name: battle.music.change
children.title: Change
children.tooltip:
If disabled, will not change music of the current section.
"Default" uses config value "battle.music.change".

children.name: battle.room.area.enabled
children.title: Enabled
children.tooltip:
If disabled, will not lock the section to the bounds found.
"Default" uses config value "battle.room.area.enabled".

children.name: battle.room.area.id
children.title: ID
children.tooltip:
ID of the area bounds that the section will be locked into.
-1 uses first found touching area. May be inaccurate with multiple touching areas.

children.name: battle.room.area.speed
children.title: Transition Speed
children.tooltip:
Speed factor for transitioning to the specified bounds.
0.0 use config value "battle.room.area.speed".

children.name: defeat.lava.ignore
children.title: Ignore Lava
children.tooltip:
If enabled, will not react to touching lava after defeat.
"Default" uses config value "defeat.lava.ignore".

children.name: defeat.lava.splash.enabled
children.title: Splash Lava
children.tooltip:
If enabled, will splash the lava around when coming in contact.
"Default" uses config value "defeat.lava.splash.enabled".

children.name: defeat.lava.splash.range
children.title: Splash Range
children.tooltip:
How far the splash will be extended in each direction.
0 uses config value "defeat.lava.splash.range".

children.name: defeat.lava.splash.strength
children.title: Splash Strength
children.tooltip:
Multiplier for the distance traversed by splashing lava.
0 uses config value "defeat.lava.splash.strength".

children.name: defeat.lava.splash.time
children.title: Splash Time
children.tooltip:
How long the splash is.
-1 uses config value "defeat.lava.splash.time".

children.name: defeat.lava.splash.timelag
children.title: Splash Time Lag
children.tooltip:
The delay between horizontally adjacent lava blocks.
-1 uses config value "defeat.lava.splash.timelag".

children.text:
Upon defeat, unless explicitly disabled, many actions will occur in succession:
- Stopping the music in the current section
- Stopping all player input
- Stopping the level timer
- Playing the defeat jingle
- Forcing player movement to the right and offscreen.
For best results, add a few blocks offscreen that the player can walk on, so they don't die during the cutscene.

children.name: defeat.default.enabled
children.title: Enabled
children.tooltip:
If enabled, will run default behaviour.
"Default" uses config value "defeat.default.enabled".

children.name: defeat.default.direction
children.title: Direction
children.tooltip:
Determines what direction the player will walk in.
"Default" uses config value "defeat.default.direction".

children.name: defeat.default.extension
children.title: Section Extension
children.tooltip:
How far the section will be extended to allow walking offscreen.
Useful changing if using a wide player sprite.
-1 uses config value "defeat.default.extension".

children.name: defeat.default.wintype
children.title: Level Win Type
children.tooltip:
Type of win given to the player on completion.
0 uses config value "defeat.default.wintype".

children.text: See documentation for more information about "Level Win Type".

children.name: defeat.fall.coyotetime
children.title: Coyote Time
children.tooltip:
Time it takes for the NPC to start falling after being defeated.
-1 uses config value "defeat.fall.coyotetime".

children.name: defeat.fall.speed
children.title: Speed
children.tooltip:
Speed at which to fall.
0 uses config value "defeat.fall.speed".

children.name: defeat.fall.lavaspeed
children.title: Lava Speed
children.tooltip:
Speed at which to fall in lava.
Has no effect if "Ignore Lava" is enabled.
0 uses config value "defeat.fall.lavaspeed".

children.text:
Audio file played when the last hit is dealt.
If "ID" is set to 0, uses the file. Otherwise, uses internal sound effect with the id "ID".

children.name: defeat.audio.stun.volume
children.title: Volume
children.tooltip: 0.0 uses config value "defeat.audio.stun.volume".

children.name: defeat.audio.stun.config
children.title: Use Config
children.tooltip: If checked, uses config value "defeat.audio.fall.id", or "defeat.audio.fall.file" if the former is 0.

children.text:
Audio file played when the NPC starts falling.
If "ID" is set to 0, uses the file. Otherwise, uses internal sound effect with the id "ID".

children.name: defeat.audio.fall.volume
children.title: Volume
children.tooltip: 0.0 uses config value "defeat.audio.fall.volume".

children.name: defeat.audio.fall.config
children.title: Use Config
children.tooltip: If checked, uses config value "defeat.audio.fall.id", "defeat.audio.fall.file" if the former is 0.

children.text:
Audio file played when the falling NPC hits lava.
If "ID" is set to 0, uses the file. Otherwise, uses internal sound effect with the id "ID".
Will not play if "Ignore Lava" is enabled.

children.name: defeat.audio.lava.volume
children.title: Volume
children.tooltip: 0.0 uses config value "defeat.audio.lava.volume".

children.name: defeat.audio.lava.config
children.title: Use Config
children.tooltip: If checked, uses config value "defeat.audio.lava.id", or "defeat.audio.lava.file" if the former is 0.

children.text:
Audio file played when the NPC goes offscreen.
If "ID" is set to 0, uses the file. Otherwise, uses internal sound effect with the id "ID".
Will not play if the default behaviour is disabled.

children.name: defeat.audio.jingle.volume
children.title: Volume
children.tooltip: 0.0 uses config value "defeat.audio.jingle.volume".

children.name: defeat.audio.jingle.config
children.title: Use Config
children.tooltip: If checked, uses config value "defeat.audio.jingle.id", or "defeat.audio.jingle.file" if the former is 0.

children.name: misc.startstate
children.title: Start State
children.tooltip:
0-indexed, what state to start in.
-1 uses config value "misc.startstate".

children.text:
What NPC to check for collision and copy the direction of.
If "Use Config" is enabled, or no NPC is selected, uses config value "misc.turnaround.id".

What Block to search for and lock the section to.
If "Use Config" is enabled, or no NPC is selected, uses config value "misc.area.id".
